home water title: Water Damage Restoration in Vancouver With 1-Hour Response
home water lead: Burst pipe, flooded basement, or ceiling leak? VR PLUS Restoration dispatches IICRC-certified techs day or night to extract water, dry materials, and prevent mold growth.
home water sublead: Serving Vancouver, Burnaby, Surrey, Richmond, Coquitlam, and all Metro Vancouver with industrial-grade drying, HEPA filtration, and direct-to-insurer billing.
home water feature1 text: Truck-mounted extraction, thermal imaging, and dehumidifiers staged in under 60 minutes to stop secondary damage.
home water feature2 text: IICRC WRT/AMRT technicians on-call nightly, weekends, and holidays.
home water feature3 text: Moisture logs, photos, and estimates packaged for adjusters to speed approvals.
home water note: Talk to a live local dispatcher—no call center delays.
home water stat 1: Average arrival under 60 minutes across Metro Vancouver
